ChatCompletions.title: 流式请求

ChatCompletions.document: 在输出最终回答之前，模型会先输出一段思维链内容，以提升最终答案的准确性。ReasoningContent表示思维链内容，Content表示回答的内容。仅deepseek-r1推理模型支持返回ReasoningContent参数
ChatCompletions.title: 思维链示例

CreateQA.title: 创建问答对

CreateQA.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lkeap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateQA
<公共请求参数>

    "KnowledgeBaseId": "4901991032",
    "Question": "你是谁",
    "Answer": "我是腾讯大模型知识引擎"
}

CreateSplitDocumentFlow.document: 对外部在线文档进行拆分
CreateSplitDocumentFlow.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lkeap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: CreateSplitDocumentFlow
<公共请求参数>

{
    "FileType": "PDF",
    "FileName": "example.pdf",
    "FileUrl": "https://qidian-qbot-1251316161.cos.ap-guangzhou.myqcloud.com/public/example/example.pdf",
    "FileStartPageNumber": 1,
    "FileEndPageNumber": 2,
    "Config": {
        "EnableMllm": true
    }
}
CreateSplitDocumentFlow.title: 创建PDF拆分任务

RetrieveKnowledge.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lkeap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RetrieveKnowledge
<公共请求参数>

{
    "KnowledgeBaseId": "49019910106",
    "Query": "国庆节放几天假",
    "RetrievalMethod": "SEMANTIC",
    "RetrievalSetting": {
        "TopK": 3,
        "ScoreThreshold": 0.7
    }
}
RetrieveKnowledge.title: 语义检索

RetrieveKnowledge.document: RetrievalSetting.Type参数为QA时，仅检索问答对。
RetrieveKnowledge.title: 语义检索（问答对）

RetrieveKnowledgeRealtime.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: lkeap.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: RetrieveKnowledgeRealtime
<公共请求参数>

{
    "KnowledgeBaseId": "49019910106",
    "Query": "国庆节放几天假",
    "DocIds": [
        "1828720159590123264"
    ],
    "RetrievalMethod": "SEMANTIC",
    "RetrievalSetting": {
        "TopK": 3,
        "ScoreThreshold": 0.7
    }
}
RetrieveKnowledgeRealtime.title: 实时语义检索
